context_of_use: The urban mobility planner inspects traffic and emission levels from individual sensors to assess local conditions.
stakeholders_and_interests: urban mobility planner: Ensure environmental and traffic conditions are considered in planning.
description: Inspect traffic and emission levels from individual sensors to assess local conditions.
triggering_event: The urban mobility planner initiates a review of sensor data.
preconditions: The urban mobility planner is logged into the Urban Mobility Management System.
Sensor data is available and up-to-date.
postconditions: The urban mobility planner has reviewed the emission levels at the pollution sensor.
The urban mobility planner has reviewed the traffic levels at the traffic sensor.
assumptions: The system provides accurate and real-time data from the sensors.
The urban mobility planner has the necessary permissions to access sensor data.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to review emission levels at pollution sensors.
The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to review traffic levels at traffic sensors.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of sensors available for review.
Confirmation on the frequency of data updates from sensors.
main_flow: 1. urban mobility planner → System displays available pollution sensors.
2. urban mobility planner selects a pollution sensor → System retrieves and displays emission levels.
3. urban mobility planner reviews emission levels → System confirms review completion.
4. urban mobility planner → System displays available traffic sensors.
5. urban mobility planner selects a traffic sensor → System retrieves and displays traffic levels.
6. urban mobility planner reviews traffic levels → System confirms review completion.
